Creating a new Rails App

Now, let's create a new app called "avimukh". By default, rails generates an app that uses SQL database. We are going to create the new app that uses Postgresl instead. It takes about a minutes to generate a folder named avimukh in the directory where the command was triggered. In the process, rails installs the dependencies. It may ask for the superuser password.
